name: Anyu
storyline: As Ikku sets off on his journey to reach the top of the mountain and fulfill his dream of seeing the northern lights, an ice age rages across the island and freezes everything in its path. With the help of new friends from the ancient civilization known as Anyu, Ikku fights back against the devastation as he helps save this arctic world.
summary: A 3D third person narrative exploration game, set in a frozen wasteland where an ancient civilization fell. Centered around movement puzzles and dealing with environment mechanics.
